attributes.name: Breastplate of Forgotten Sins
attributes.description: "For the right amount of coin, all can be forgotten."
attributes.parsed_description: "For the right amount of coin, all can be forgotten."

attributes.name: Breastplate of Titanic Will
attributes.description: "The Titans of old bestowed this armor upon their favored champion, tasking her to destroy their enemies and all who would oppose them."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Titans of old bestowed this armor upon their favored champion, tasking her to destroy their enemies and all who would oppose them."

attributes.name: Briar Charm
attributes.description: "May you pass through the forest as silent as a wolf, leaving no trail behind you."

attributes.name: Resilient
attributes.parsed_description: Critical hits deal 3.0% less damage to you.
Critical hits deal 4.6% less damage to you.

attributes.name: Freedom
attributes.parsed_description: Slow, Stun, and Silence expires -3.0% faster.
Slow, Stun, and Silence expires -4.6% faster.
Slow, Stun, and Silence expires -4.6% faster.

attributes.name: Invigorated
attributes.parsed_description: Weaken, Disease, Exhaust, and Rend expires -3.0% faster.
Weaken, Disease, Exhaust, and Rend expires -4.6% faster.

attributes.name: Mana Toast
attributes.parsed_description: When you drink a health potion gain 10.0 mana.
When you drink a health potion gain 24.2 mana.

attributes.name: Duplicating Toast
attributes.parsed_description: When you drink a potion 5.0% chance it doesn't consume.
When you drink a potion 11.1% chance it doesn't consume.

attributes.name: Luck
attributes.parsed_description: +0.5% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.
+1.8% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.

attributes.name: Stamina Recovery
attributes.parsed_description: When you are hit while below 50% gain 50.0 stamina (30.0s cooldown.) Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
